# kiwi-sidebar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                | Attribute  | Description                 | Type                | Default     |
| ----------------------- | ---------- | --------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `position` _(required)_ | `position` | The position of the sidebar | `"left" \| "right"` | `undefined` |
| `visible` _(required)_  | `visible`  | Visibility of the sidebar   | `boolean`           | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event          | Description                       | Type                |
| -------------- | --------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `requestClose` | Event signaling a backdrop click. | `CustomEvent<void>` |
